tools.cast_send:
WARNING: This sends REAL transactions to the blockchain!
• Always simulate first using cast_call tool with the --trace flag enabled.
• Double-check addresses and values.
• Transactions are irreversible!

flags.rpc-url: TIP: Use `search_rpc_url` or `list_popular_chains` tools to find RPC endpoints.

positionals.sig:
FORMAT: 'functionName(type1,type2)' for functions (e.g., 'transfer(address,uint256)').
For tuples/structs (like args in cast_abi_encode tool), omit the function name: e.g., '(uint256,address)'.
positionals.args:
FORMAT: Use quotes around composite types!

Simple types: 0x123... 1000
Tuple/struct: "(100,0x123...)"
Nested: "((100,0x123...),200)"
Array: "[1,2,3]"
Struct array: "[(100,0x123...),(200,0x987...)]"

Real example for setReservation(address,(uint64,uint64,uint64,bytes,bytes)):
  0x7Fd8cF9Ebc94763fA7a323F523392788cf5733a2 "(32768,1762369681,1793905681,0x0001,0x3232)"
